programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A davy back with the foxy pirates!

programme.title: The Davy Back Fight begins with a treacherous Donut Race around Ling Ring Long Land! The Straw Hats square off against the Foxy Pirates in a battle to see who loses a crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 1! One lap of the donut race!

programme.title: Nami uses her considerable skill as a navigator to put the Straw Hats on the verge of victory, but the captain of the Foxy Pirates has more than a few dirty tricks up his sleeve!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Silver fox foxy! The merciless interference!

programme.title: Thanks to some foxy sabotage, Chopper has been lost to the enemy. The only hope for getting him back lies with Zoro and Sanji, but can they learn to work together in time to save the little reindeer?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 2! Shoot it into the groggy ring!

programme.title: Sanji and Zoro take a beating at the hands of the Groggy Monsters, but they won’t give up the fight. With a little luck – and some teamwork – they’ll emerge victorious from round two of the Davy Back Fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A barrage of red cards in groggy ring!

programme.title: Round three of the Davy Back Fight is a rip roaring roller derby! Chopper’s fate still hangs in the balance, and the Straw Hats have a huge problem: Luffy doesn’t know how to skate!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Davy Back Fight sprints toward a sensational finish, the Straw Hats find themselves on the brink of defeat! Luffy’s finally managed to stay on his skates, but the Foxy Pirates are notorious cheaters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A seriously heated race! Into the final round!

programme.title: The Straw Hats somehow manage to defeat the Foxy Pirates and win back Chopper, but Luffy eagerly accepts the challenge of a rematch! What is the captain thinking? And will his crew mutiny?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A devious game of dodge ball costs the Straw Hats their archaeologist. Now, they’ll have to win an unusual uphill race to reclaim Robin and avoid losing another crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown on the cliff! Red light, green light!

programme.title: Robin and Chopper have both been lost to the Foxy Pirates, and there’s only one match remaining in the Davy Back Fight! Luffy’s got a plan to get his mates back, but failure would mean the end of the Straw Hats forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The captains square off! The final combat round!

programme.title: Luffy and Captain Foxy go toe-to-toe in a brutal battle waged aboard a booby-trapped boat. Luffy is fighting for his crew, but Captain Foxy’s dirty tricks have him on the ropes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full-blast slow-slow onslaught vs. Invulnerable luffy

programme.title: Luffy’s epic battle with Captain Foxy reaches its riveting end, and a very old man with a very tall horse reunites with a face from very long ago.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic, heated combat! The fateful final conclusion

programme.title: When Luffy and his mates lose their memory, Robin is the only Straw Hat who can remember their adventures together. Can she recover their recollections before the crew splits up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Was it lost? Stolen? Who are you?

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Texans Never Cry, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry learns that a familyís money was used to buy counterfeit Mexican lottery tickets, and he has to track down the counterfeiters. Gene faces long odds when a killer comes to do away with him.

programme.title: Hills Of Utah, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry returns to the town where his father was murdered and finds a mine owner and cattleman feuding. Things get complicated when a boy dies and the mine owner comes gunning for Gene.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: A silver mine with a secret entrance along the Mexican border is the setting for this typical Roy Rogers western with music.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa go to the dentist to get their cavities treated. The dental clinic is actually a trap set up by Palla-Palla to find Pegasus.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Makoto compete to win the heart of Honjo, a young principal. But their rivalry starts to put a strain on their friendship.
programme.sub-title: Clash of Dreams: Minako and Makoto's Broken Friendship

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa’s school is having a sports day. However, one of its main events is jumping over the vaulting box, which Chibi-Usa is not very good at.
programme.sub-title: Overcome Your Fear: The Jump to Freedom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa and Usagi befriend a young painter named Kamoi at the park. Kamoi is visited by Cere-Cere, who asks the man to paint a portrait of her.
programme.sub-title: Don't Lose Sight of Your Dreams: The Mirror of Truth

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Palla-Pall turns Sailor Chibi Moon into an adult and Sailor Moon into a child. Chibi-Usa turns into shock when Pegasus can no longer hear her.
programme.sub-title: Pegasus's Secret: The Boy Who Protects the Dream World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls begin to suspect that Chibi-Usa is in love. Eager to know who the boy is, they try to get Chibi-Usa to talk, but with little success.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends help set up the stage for the Coming of Age Day ceremony. They befriend four girls who are actually the Amazoness Quartet.
programme.sub-title: Dream to be an Adult: The Amazoness' Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Strange spider webs begin to appear all across the Juban District. The girls notice that these webs are all originating from the Dead Moon Circus.
programme.sub-title: Terror in Motion: The Dark Queen's Evil Hand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia sets her plan in motion by starting a solar eclipse that will leave the world in eternal darkness.
programme.sub-title: The Source of Darkness: Dead Moon Circus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dead Moon discovers that Sailor Chibi Moon was hiding Pegasus and captures her. Sailor Chibi Moon learns the history behind the Dead Moon's queen.
programme.sub-title: Labyrinth of Mirrors: Chibi Moon Captured

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia demands that Helios give up the Golden Crystal in exchange for Sailor Chibi Moon. The Sailor Guardians are struggling to defeat Zirconia.
programme.sub-title: The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehalennia's Magic

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia regains her full power and proceeds to put the world into an eternal slumber.Sailor Moon tries to activate the power of the Golden Crystal.
programme.sub-title: When the Crystal Shines: The Beautiful Power of Dreams

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Golden Crystal’s power defeats Nehelenia, pushing her back into the abyss. Nehelenia tries to take Sailor Chibi Moon with her.
programme.sub-title: Dreams Forever: Fill the Heavens with Light

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends start their new lives as high school girls. Nehalennia breaks out of her prison to seek revenge against the Sailor Guardians.
programme.sub-title: The Flower of Nightmares Scatters: The Queen of Darkness Returns

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru starts to age at an accelerated rate, from a baby to a young girl within days. She warns of coming danger that will soon befall Sailor Moon.
programme.sub-title: Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The city is being plagued by a strange illness that causes people to become obsessed with staring into the mirror for hours, even days.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Mirror: Mamoru Caught in a Nightmare

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennia’s action is starting to cause a time paradox.
programme.sub-title: Night of Destiny: The Sailor Guardians' Ordeals

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehalennia. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but they fall victim to Nehalennia’s traps.
programme.sub-title: For Love: The Endless Battle in the Dark World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennia’s palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.
programme.sub-title: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru tells Usagi that he’s accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship.
programme.sub-title: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi runs into Seiya and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, Seiya and the rest of Three Lights have transferred to her school.
programme.sub-title: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director.
programme.sub-title: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation

programme.desc: Ami invites Taiki to come and watch the Wataru’s Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher Amanogawa, only to be rejected.
programme.sub-title: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yaten’s pet cat.
programme.sub-title: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
programme.sub-title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert. Michiru gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming.
programme.sub-title: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya’s star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi’s house as her younger sister.
programme.sub-title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.
programme.sub-title: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess.
programme.sub-title: Taiki's Song Filled with Passion and Faith

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A massive drug operation changes the lives of three conflicted police officers (Richard Gere, Don Cheadle, Ethan Hawke) in one of New York's most-violent precincts.

programme.title: Detroit, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel; by the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.title: City of Lies, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.desc: As a young cop, Erin Bell went undercover to infiltrate a gang in the California desert -- with tragic results. When the gang leader re-emerges, Bell embarks on an obsessive quest to bring him to justice and make peace with her tortured past.

programme.desc: A massive drug operation changes the lives of three conflicted police officers (Richard Gere, Don Cheadle, Ethan Hawke) in one of New York's most-violent precincts.

programme.desc: An expert (Sylvester Stallone) in prison security joins forces with an inmate (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to break out of a top-secret, high-tech facility.

programme.desc: With showstopping performances by a star-studded cast, Dreamgirls soars with the amazing story of three female singers who learn that anything is possible when you hold on to your dreams.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Death at a Funeral is a hilarious day in the life of an American family come together to put a beloved husband and father to rest.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Bopha!, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Micah Mangena is sitting on a powder keg and doesn't know it. He's a sergeant in South Africa's police force, a supporter of the powers that be. But the strife tearing at the fabric of 1980 South Africa is about to rip Micah's own world apart.

programme.title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: This ultra-hip Comedy in the tradition of The Naked Gun and Airplane stars Keenan Ivory Wayans in an Action Adventure filled with screwball gags and side-splitting one-liners.

programme.title: Barbershop, (2002, Late Night Comedies)
programme.desc: Calvin, who inherited a struggling barbershop, views the shop as nothing but a burden and a waste of his time. After selling the shop to a local loan shark, Calvin slowly begins to see his father's vision and legacy.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Barbershop is threatened by the arrival of a hip, well-financed chain barbershop that's about to open next door.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: The Galaxy Railways
programme.desc: The crew of Big One mourns the loss of Bruce, and Captain Bulge is called before an inquiry panel to answer for his insubordination.

programme.title: The Galaxy Railways
programme.desc: A mysterious voice identifies Destiny Station as the next target in a string of destructions; Bulge accepts what he must do.

In the Republic, Lena organizes a desperate last stand against the invading Legion; in the Federacy, Shin, his friends, and Frederica manage to survive the bombardment, but the Legion inflicts significant losses.
As Nordlicht prepares for their mission, Grethe successfully petitions to allow the use of the prototype ground effect airplane "Nachzehrer;" Grethe volunteers to be the pilot.

As the Nachzehrer nears the Morpho, it comes under anti-air attack; Nordlicht fights its way through the Legion defenders and approaches the Morpho, only for Shin to realize that the damaged Morpho is bait for a trap.
Deep in enemy territory, with supplies running low and damage piling up, Nordlicht makes a final desperate march towards Morpho.
The members of Nordlicht drop out one by one in the face of the Legion's onslaught, and Shin faces the Morpho alone.

Shin reaches the Morpho and begins his final battle; when a sudden, unexpected round of artillery fire and a desperate action by Frederica create an opening, he gets close to the point where Kiriya is hiding.
With the defeat of the Morpho, Shin and his comrades are able to return alive to the Federacy; after only the briefest respites, they request to be assigned to the front lines again.

programme.desc: The twin boys Migi and Dali live in an orphanage until they are adopted by the Sonoyamas.

programme.desc: Scott battles Corg while Lancer and Sera defend the Invid hive long enough for the Regess to gather her brood and make a final bid for survival.

In the Republic, Lena organizes a desperate last stand against the invading Legion; in the Federacy, Shin, his friends, and Frederica manage to survive the bombardment, but the Legion inflicts significant losses.
As Nordlicht prepares for their mission, Grethe successfully petitions to allow the use of the prototype ground effect airplane "Nachzehrer;" Grethe volunteers to be the pilot.

As the Nachzehrer nears the Morpho, it comes under anti-air attack; Nordlicht fights its way through the Legion defenders and approaches the Morpho, only for Shin to realize that the damaged Morpho is bait for a trap.

programme.title: Redenção, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Agata Buzek, Jason Statham Diretor: Steven Knight

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, François Berléand, Jeroen Krabbé, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. A romancista Catherine está novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avaliá-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e é atraído para um jogo sedutor. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, Charlotte Rampling, David Thewlis, Stan Collymore, Indira Varma, Heathcote Williams, Hugh Dancy, Terence Harvey, Jan Ch... Diretor: Michael Caton-Jones

programme.title: Primal, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Frank capturou animais selvagens na selva brasileira, incluindo uma onça branca de 400 libras. Ele a envia no mesmo navio que um assassino preso. O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Nicolas Cage¸ Framke Janssen, Kevin Durand, LaMonica Garrett Diretor: Nick Powell

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. As complicações surgem durante uma situação perigosa de refém em um restaurante. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ray Liotta, Nikki Reed, Stephen Lang Diretor: David A Armstrong

programme.title: Entre a Vida e a Morte, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Ben Garvey leva uma vida simples ao lado de sua esposa Lisa e a filha Katie. Ele trabalha duro no Fort Garry Brewery Company, mas ainda está em período de experiência. É quando recebe a visita de seu irmão Ricky, que acabou de deixar a prisão. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Paul Walker, Piper Perabo Diretor: John Glenn

programme.title: Marcados Pela Guerra, (2014)
programme.desc: 2014. Uma jovem decide se alistar no exército na esperança de ser mandada para o Iraque, onde entraria em contato com uma nova cultura. Ela acaba, no entanto, sendo realocada para Guantánamo, onde se depara com uma rotina de ódio e abuso. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Stewart, Kristen, Garrison, Liane Diretor: Peter Sattler

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991)
programme.desc: 1991. No fim do século 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violência crescendo, até tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jet Li, Biao Yuen, Rosamund Kwan, Jacky Cheung, Kent Cheng, Kam-Fai Yuen, Shi-Kwan Yen, Shun Lau, Wu Ma, Jianguo Qiu Diretor: Hark Tsui

programme.title: Endiabrado, (2000)
programme.desc: 2000. Um jovem desesperado para mudar de vida faz um acordo com o Diabo. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances O’Connor, Frances O'Connor, Paul Adelstein, Brian Doyle-Murray, Jeff Doucette, Miriam Shor, Orlando Jones, Toby Huss Diretor: Harold Ramis

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de três amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingança contra o antigo parceiro. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: B13-U 13º Distrito - Ultimato, (2004)
programme.desc: 2004. Damien e Leito estão retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma missão para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco líderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os serviços secretos da cidade tomem medidas drásticas para resolver o problema. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Cyril Raffaelli, David Belle, Philippe Torreton Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

programme.title: Caçado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam é um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vítimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caçadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, José Zúñiga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson Diretor: David Barrett

programme.title: Jogo Assassino, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. A polícia prende um psicopata que está ligado a vários sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura será apenas o início de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vítimas. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ben Kingsley, Stanley Tucci, Alexandra Daddario, Henry Cavill Diretor: David Raymond

programme.title: A Vinganca é Minha, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Após o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho através da fronteira para Vancouver. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Blitz, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Blitz é um serial killer de Londres que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia duro, inflexível e politicamente incorreto, terão a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Paddy Considine, Aidan Gillen, David Riley Diretor: Elliott Lester, Jordan Hill

programme.title: A Equipe da Noite, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Um grupo de caçadores de recompensas é forçado a passar a noite em um motel no deserto mexicano. Lá eles descobrirão que sua protegida, uma mulher chinesa, é muito mais do que ela deixa transparecer. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Luke Goss, Danny Trejo Diretor: Christian Sesma

programme.title: Assassino Americano, (2021)
programme.desc: 2021. O gângster americano Erik Vasquez está planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartéis quanto de seus próprios aliados. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Philippe A. Hassad, Maurice Compte, Maya Stojan Diretor: RJ Collins

programme.title: Aceleração Máxima, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Uma mãe tem uma noite para fazer algumas tarefas em Los Angeles que exigem uma arma, se ela quiser ver seu filho vivo. Ele é mantido por um chefe da máfia. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Sean Patrick Flanery, Dolph Lundgren, Chuck Liddell, Natalie Burn, Quinton 'Rampage' Jackson, Danny Trejo, Al Sapienza... Diretor: Daniel Zirilli, Michael Merino

programme.title: Jogo Assassino, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. A polícia prende um psicopata que está ligado a vários sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura será apenas o início de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vítimas. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ben Kingsley, Stanley Tucci, Alexandra Daddario, Henry Cavill Diretor: David Raymond

programme.title: A Vinganca é Minha, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Após o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho através da fronteira para Vancouver. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Blitz, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Blitz é um serial killer de Londres que está matando policiais. programme.title: Fim da Linha, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Um guarda de segurança de shopping, e ex-agente federal antidrogas, cruza o caminho de um grande traficante de drogas após salvar uma mulher que estava em perigo. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Florin Piersic Jr., Jade Ewen Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Ouro Branco, (1987)
programme.desc: 1987. Rap, carrões, blusões de couro espalhafatosos e muita grana no bolso. Ace entra para o mundo do crime sem desconfiar que a partir daí sua vida já não vale mais nada. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Mekhi Phifer, Wood Harris, Chi McBride Diretor: Charles Stone III

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gêneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Jogo de Espiões, (2001)
programme.desc: 2001. O agente aposentado da CIA Nathan Muir relembra como treinou Tom Bishop enquanto lutava contra a política da agência para libertá-lo de seus captores chineses. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Michael Redford, Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Stephen Dillane, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Matthew Marsh, Todd Boyce, Michael Paul Chan, Catherine McCormack, Larry Bryggman Diretor: Tony Scott

programme.title: Pluto TV Filmes Ação, (2026)
programme.desc: 2026. no info available Gêneros: no info available

programme.title: Um Vampiro no Brooklyn, (1995)
programme.desc: 1995. O excêntrico vampiro Maximillian viaja até Nova York para procurar uma esposa e dar continuidade à sua linhagem. Lá ele conhece a bela detetive Rita que ele acredita ser a descendente de uma ordem de vampiros. programme.desc: 1970. O Mestre das Sombras anuncia o dia do juízo final e cabe aos dragões pará-lo. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: A Última Peça, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Paula organiza uma festa surpresa para seu irmão e, quando está prestes a terminar de decorar a casa com muitos dinossauros, descobre que um dos brinquedos veio faltando uma peça. Para recuperá-la, ela tem que enfrentar o malvado dono da loja. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Diário de Tati, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu diário. Desde ficar em recuperação em matemática até os esforços para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixão atual. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Lora, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma jovem perde seu noivo durante um trágico acidente de moto, e três anos mais tarde se apaixona por seu irmão mais novo. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: North Hollywood, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Acabando a escola, um jovem precisa decidir entre o sonho de tornar-se skatista profissional ou ir para faculdade como seu pai deseja. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Escola de Modelos de Bikini, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Quando T.J. e Benji, dois californianos de vinte e poucos anos e melhores amigos, perdem suas namoradas, eles resolvem abrir um novo negócio para ganhar dinheiro e conhecer novas garotas: uma academia de modelos de biquínis. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Encontro Selvagem, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Les Moore é um homem de negócios que teve um encontro inesperado após algumas bebidas em Albuquerque, Novo México. Desde então o fato fica revirando em sua cabeça, até que ele decide voltar ao local junto com sua colega de trabalho. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Stretch, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Stretch é um chofer de limusine em Los Angeles que se esforça para pagar suas dívidas e que tenta, sem sucesso, superar seu vício no jogo e na cocaína, deixar suas expectativas como ator e um romance falido para trás. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Um Homem Comum, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que há uma recompensa milionária para quem souber onde o fugitivo está. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais se tornam vítimas de uma gangue. Os policiais são brutalmente assassinados e um jovem é designado para ajudá-lo, mas a gangue volta a agir, iniciando uma aventura cheia de ação e vingança. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Filha de Deus, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O detetive Scott Galban busca a verdade sobre a misteriosa morte de seu parceiro. Enquanto isso, Isabel de la Cruz, uma mulher local que diz ter sido testemunha de um milagre, começa a vivenciar estranhos acontecimentos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Recompensa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após passar 12 anos na prisão, o famoso arrombador de cofres Dom Hemingway volta para as ruas de Londres em busca da sua recompensa por ter ficado de boca fechada durante todo esse tempo. Ao lado do amigo Dickie, ele faz uma visita ao chefe do crime. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: O Ninho, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Samuel é um menino paraplégico que mora com a mãe Elena em uma mansão isolada. Quando conhece Denise, uma empregada adolescente, ele finalmente encontra forças para se opor às restrições de sua mãe e se abrir para o mundo. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Bons pra Cachorro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Almôndega e Cassie, dois cães de estimação, precisam superar suas diferenças para evitar que ladrões assaltem a casa dos seus donos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: O Pequeno Gângster, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Rik Boskamp é filho de um contador, e não aguenta mais sofrer bullying na escola. Ao assistir a um filme sobre a máfia, tem uma ideia que parece brilhante. Fingir que seu pai é um poderoso mafioso. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um jovem delinquente do ensino médio é obrigado a ser o tutor de uma escola de baixa renda. Lá, ele se apaixona pela filha do pastor e vive uma paixão cheia de diferenças e surpresas. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alex Rider, adolescente britânico habilidoso em linguística, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, é recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira missão é investigar o bilionário Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doações de mega computadores às escolas da Inglaterra. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Big Stone Gap é o lar de personagens charmosos e excêntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacêutica de 35 anos, é a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabeça para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de família. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Deus Não Está Morto - Uma Luz na Escuridão, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um incêndio atinge a Igreja de Saint James, devastando a congregação e o Pastor Dave, e a universidade vizinha usa a tragédia para tentar despejar a congregação de seu campus. Dave recorre a seu irmão, um advogado ateu, para tentar reerguer a igreja. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Nosso Amor, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Em um íntimo retrato do casamento, um casal que divide a vida há muitos anos precisa lidar com uma grave doença. Enquanto vivem o medo da perda, eles usam o humor e a parceria para manter a esperança. Gêneros: Drama

Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: April Stewart, Isaac Hayes, Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Eric Stough, Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T05E06

programme.title: 2003. Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer". Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T07E11

programme.title: 2004. Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: April Stewart, Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Matt Stone, Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T08E02

programme.title: 2004. Cartman estava tentando voar, mas o máximo que conseguiu foi um golpe na cabeça e isso fez com que ele ficasse dois dias em coma. A polícia local assume que agora Cartman tem poderes psíquicos e que pode resolver casos extraordinários. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: April Stewart, Matt Stone, Mona Marshall, Trey Parker Diretor: Matt Stone, Trey Parker
programme.desc: South Park - T08E13

programme.title: 2005. Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. programme.desc: South Park - T09E06

programme.title: 2005. Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. programme.desc: South Park - T09E11

programme.title: 2006. Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caçar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. programme.title: 2006. A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. programme.title: 2006. Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. programme.desc: 2008. Guy se arrepende ao ver seus três alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lágrimas escorrem em seu rosto. programme.title: Air Bud

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: An eager beagle joins undercover canines on a mission to foil a feline plot to make all people allergic to dogs. Starring Jeff Goldblum, Elizabeth Perkins, Miriam Margolyes.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs 2: The Revenge of Kitty Galore

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A woman who has miraculously remained young for nearly 80 years meets a charismatic philanthropist who reawakens her passion for life and romance. Starring Blake Lively, Michiel Huisman, Kathy Baker.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christines different worlds of school and work collide, which forces her to devise a way to come out on top.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience

programme.title: Minx

programme.title: Matthias and Maxime
programme.desc: Two young mens lifelong friendship is tested when they act in a movie whose script calls for them to kiss each other. Starring Gabriel DAlmeida Freitas, Xavier Dolan, Harris Dickinson.

programme.title: Metisse
programme.desc: Starring Julie Mauduech, Hubert Kounde, Mathieu Kassovitz.

programme.title: Maîtresse

programme.title: Les Mistons

programme.desc: A suave thief (Herbert Marshall) and his chic partner (Miriam Hopkins) target a rich Paris widow (Kay Francis). Starring Miriam Hopkins, Kay Francis, Herbert Marshall.

programme.desc: A wanted man (Clint Walker) leads a widow (Virginia Mayo) and her son to a fort away from Indians and a gunrunner (Brian Keith). Starring Clint Walker, Virginia Mayo, Brian Keith.

programme.title: Road Trip (2000)

programme.title: Blades of Glory (2007)

programme.title: Orange County (2002)

programme.title: The High and the Mighty (1954)
programme.desc: On a flight from Hawaii to California, the engine dies on the plane Dan is flying. As he prepares for a crash landing, the passengers reassess their lives.

programme.title: Lilies of the Field (1963)
programme.desc: A traveling laborer teaches English to a group of German-speaking nuns while building a chapel for their community.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii (1961)
programme.desc: After returning to Hawaii from being in the army, a pineapple tycoons rebellious son turns into an island tour guide with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Annie Hall (1977)
programme.desc: A New York comedian (Woody Allen) recalls his lost love, a kooky singer (Diane Keaton) with a style all her own.

programme.title: Sidewalks of New York (2001)
programme.desc: A television producer (Edward Burns), a teacher (Rosario Dawson), a musician, a waitress, a dentist and a real estate agent deal with rocky romances.

programme.title: A Guy Thing (2003)

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back (2001)
programme.sub-title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back (2001)

programme.title: Wild Bill (1995)

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead (1995)
programme.desc: A cowgirl (Sharon Stone) enters a quick-draw contest to get revenge on an outlaw (Gene Hackman) in a town called Redemption.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.desc: Bianchis insanity plea collapses, and he flips on cousin Angelo Buono to avoid the death penalty; but as the trial becomes a media circus, Bianchis story keeps changing, forcing the district attorney to move to dismiss the case.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alice searches for her boyfriend Tom, uncovering secrets in his charity that make her question his past and what she thought she knew.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alice uncovers secrets about Tom as allies turn suspect; after a murder and a deadly chase, she fears hes caught in something darker.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.desc: As the case falters, the judge turns Buonos prosecution over to the California Attorney General, launching the longest and most expensive trial in U.S. history; decades later, Bianchi maintains his innocence and fights for parole.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire (1996)
programme.desc: A Los Angeles sports agent (Tom Cruise) finds love with a pretty accountant (Renee Zellweger) after an attack of conscience costs him his job and fiancee.

programme.title: Breathless (1983)
programme.desc: A French coed (Valerie Kaprisky) flees with a West Coast car thief (Richard Gere) who lives by comic books and Jerry Lee Lewis music.

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther (1975)
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Pink Panther (1975)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor (1975)

programme.title: Seabiscuit (2003)

programme.title: Wildcat (2021)
programme.desc: A captive reporter must figure out a way to escape from the militants who ambushed her convoy in the Middle East.

programme.title: Drop Zone (1994)
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (Wesley Snipes) turns skydiver to nab a hijacker (Gary Busey) and his parachutist gang planning to invade the DEA.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls (1997)
programme.desc: After escaping from a serial killer, a doctor (Ashley Judd) helps police and a forensic psychologist (Morgan Freeman) track the madman.

programme.title: Face/Off (1997)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie (2002)
programme.desc: Nitwits (Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Chris Pontius) perform outrageous stunts and pull practical jokes on an unsuspecting public.

programme.title: Jackass: Number Two (2006)
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane (2016)
programme.desc: A woman (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men (John Goodman, John Gallagher Jr.).

programme.title: Disgraced (2017)
programme.desc: An examination of the events surrounding the 2003 murder of Baylor University mens basketball star Patrick Dennehy.

programme.title: The Score (2001)
programme.desc: A master thief (Robert De Niro) agrees to work with a volatile partner (Edward Norton) for one last heist before he retires.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Event Horizon (1997)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Yards (2000)
programme.desc: A friends lure of easy money draws an ex-con into the corrupt world of his uncles subway-train business.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives (2004)
programme.desc: A man and his wife move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides (1999)
programme.desc: Men reminisce about intriguing sisters, whose parents (James Woods, Kathleen Turner) quarantined them after one of the five killed herself.

programme.title: Frida (2002)
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: Like Water for Chocolate (1992)
programme.desc: The youngest daughter (Lumi Cavazos) of a Mexican family expresses her feelings in preparing wonderful food, when tradition keeps her from marrying her true love (Marco Leonardi).

programme.title: Cold Mountain (2003)
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a wounded Confederate soldier (Jude Law) abandons his duties to make his way home to his sweetheart (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Jersey Girl (2004)
programme.desc: A young woman (Liv Tyler) changes the life of a single father (Ben Affleck) who used to be a successful New York music publicist.

programme.title: Losing Isaiah (1995)
programme.desc: An ex-crack addict (Halle Berry) fights for custody of her son adopted by a social worker (Jessica Lange) and her husband (David Strathairn).

programme.title: End of Sentence (2019)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a young man reluctantly embarks on a journey with his estranged father to spread his mothers ashes in her native Ireland.

programme.title: Blue Eyed Girl (2025)
programme.desc: Summoned home to visit her two sisters and her ailing father, a woman starts to re-evaluate her life as she wonders what could have been.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Pixie (2020)
programme.desc: Pixie sets out to avenge her mothers death and attempts a heist that will give her the means to leave her small-town life behind. When the plan goes horribly wrong, shes forced to team up with a pair of misfits who are clearly in over their heads.

programme.title: Shes All That (1999)
programme.desc: A cool teen (Freddie Prinze Jr.) bets a friend that he can transform the schools geekiest girl (Rachael Leigh Cook) into a prom queen.

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton! (2004)
programme.sub-title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton! (2004)
programme.desc: Secretly in love with his friend (Kate Bosworth), a supermarket manager (Topher Grace) becomes jealous when she meets a famous actor (Josh Duhamel).

programme.title: Eagle vs. Shark (2007)
programme.desc: A socially awkward fast-food waitress (Loren Horsley) flips over a video-game clerk (Jemaine Clement), who is busy plotting revenge on a bully from his past.

programme.title: No Strings Attached (2011)
programme.desc: After sex enters the equation, two lifelong friends (Natalie Portman, Ashton Kutcher) make a pact to keep their relationship purely physical.

programme.title: The Romantics (2010)
programme.desc: Longtime rivalries resurface in the hours before a woman is scheduled to marry the former lover of her college roommate.

programme.title: Sabrina (1995)
programme.desc: Sons (Harrison Ford, Greg Kinnear) of a Long Island tycoon become romantic rivals for the chauffeurs daughter (Julia Ormond).

programme.title: Forces of Nature (1999)
programme.desc: A bridegroom (Ben Affleck) hurries by plane to his wedding, but he and his seatmate (Sandra Bullock) must find other modes of travel.

programme.title: Emma (1996)
programme.desc: Things keep getting worse after a young matchmaker (Gwyneth Paltrow) finds a mate for a simple young woman (Toni Collette) in rural 1800s England.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted (2004)
programme.desc: A young woman (Anne Hathaway) embarks on a journey to break the curse of obedience placed upon her by a fairy godmother.

programme.title: Love, Rosie (2014)
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex are best friends until Alexs family moves to America. They gamble everything to keep their love and friendship alive over the years and miles.

programme.title: Jennys Wedding (2015)
programme.desc: When Jenny (Katherine Heigl) decides to marry a woman (Alexis Bledel), her conventional family must accept who she is or risk losing her forever.

programme.title: Would You Rather (2012)
programme.desc: Iris (Brittany Snow) and seven other desperate people become trapped in Shepards (Jeffrey Combs) mansion. Shepard forces them to play a sadistic game for a large sum of money -- but the dilemmas become increasingly deadly.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: The Hours (2002)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall (2024)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: We visit the Orange River, just below Van der Kloof Dam, to target largemouth and smallmouth yellowfish at the comfortable Gkhui Gkhui River Lodge in the Northern Cape.

programme.desc: Experience one of the worlds great natural wonders as hordes of Sharp Tooth Catfish hunt en mass creating a feeding frenzy like you have never encountered before. Add to that the majesty of the Okavango Delta and it simply has to be seen.
